Northwest Gbaya bụ asụsụ Gbaya nkè á na-asụ n'ofe Cameroon ná Central African Republic

Isi ụdị dị iche ichè bụ Kara (Kàrà, Gbaya Kara), áhà yá ná ọtụtụ asụsụ ndị agbata obi; Lay (Loney) bụ naanị obere mpaghara dị n'ebe ugwu Mbodomo, ná otu ụzọ n'ụzọ atọ n'etiti yá ná Toongo nkè á na-akpọghị áhà ná Moñino (2010), mana asụsụ Gbaya dị n' ndịda na-emetụta yá.
Màkà emume mmalite nwoke, ndị Gbaya Kara na-eji asụsụ á na-akpọ La'bi.
Ozi ndị á dabere ná 'Bodoe (Kàrà) ná olumba ùgwù:
Paulette Roulon-Doko na-eji transcription phonetic eme ìhè n'ọrụ  ná Northwest Gbaya
na-ahụ ụdaume imi n'ebe ahụ ná tilde n'okpuru mkpụrụedemede ụdaume Ōa, ɛ, Ōa.
Na Cameroon, a na-eji mkpụrụedemede dabere ná General Alphabet of Cameroonian Languages, karịsịa ná ntụgharị Bible n'asụsụ Gbaya nke Alliance biblique du Cameroun bipụtara
Á na-ahụ ụdaume imi n'ebe ahụ ná cedilla n'okpuru mkpụrụedemede ụdaume Ōa̧, ɛ̧, i̧, ɔ̧, u̧.
